articles.title: Beware, scammers are now stealing money using public charging ports: here is how, tips to stay safe - India Today
articles.description: Cyber scammers are exploiting public charging ports, commonly found at airports, hotels, cafes, and other public places to steal sensitive user information from smartphones.
articles.content: By Divya Bhati: Public charging ports are undeniably convenient, rescuing us from emergency situations when our devices run out of battery. However, in today's technological landscape, you can never … [+2451 chars]
